name: Paymobil
headline: The super simple stablecoin wallet with free transactions
description:
Paymobil is a global bank account replacement using stablecoins.
We make it possible to send money to any email or phone number in the world in seconds.

We have taken all the friction out of the current terrible UX with crypto p2p payments and made it better than regular consumer products like Venmo and Square Cash. Unlike those it works across borders and can launch globally due to our non-custodial architecture.

# Buy, save and get paid in dollars
Regardless of where in the world you live, use Paymobil to buy and save in dollars. You can use cards or bank accounts to buy dollars, or get paid in stablecoin directly to the app.
# Send money anywhere in the world in seconds, for FREE
You can request and send money to any email or phone number in the world. When you pay friends and family abroad, they can have the money in seconds instead of waiting for days. You pay NO transaction fees when sending or receiving money with Paymobil.
# Stablecoins, 100% backed by US Dollars
We make instant global payments possible by using US dollar-backed stablecoins that can be cashed out in the recipients local currency. Stablecoins are cryptocurrencies where the value is pegged to a national currency, in this case the US dollar.We use USD Coin (USDC) on the Polygon Network. It is the most trusted stablecoin and is 100% backed by real dollars. It is audited every month by a top-five US accounting firm. The current USDC supply is over $50B, and you can always exchange 1 USDC for 1 USD directly to your bank account (in supported countries). Or at many exchanges worldwide such as Coinbase, Circle, Binance, Kraken, Bitso, Ripio and more.
# Fast & easy to use
Paymobil is a user-friendly USDC-wallet where you can hold your money securely and don’t worry about losing your private key. It’s the first wallet that is easier to use than legacy p2p services. You don’t have to care that it is built with crypto technology under the hood.
# Secure, yet simple
A private key to your wallet is created on your phone when you sign up. Only you have access to your funds, we never see your private key. Your key is encrypted and automatically backed up to iCloud or Google Drive. You never have to worry about loosing your private key if you loose your phone. Just install Paymobil on a new phone and you are ready to go.
[Get Paymobil](https://www.paymobil.co/<https:/apps.apple.com/app/id1499719318>)

generated_description:
### Paymobil: Revolutionizing Money Transfers with Stablecoins

Founded in 2020 as part of Y Combinator's Winter 2020 batch, Paymobil is on a mission to simplify global transactions. This San Francisco-based fintech startup is positioning itself as the go-to wallet for stablecoins, offering a seamless and user-friendly alternative to traditional banking. With a lean team of just two employees and guided by Group Partner Nan, they are tackling a big pain point in the world of personal finance.

**What Does Paymobil Do?**
At its core, Paymobil allows users to send and receive money instantly, without transaction fees, via a stablecoin wallet that operates across borders. Unlike existing services like Venmo or Square Cash, which operate primarily within a single country's ecosystem, Paymobil facilitates transactions in any part of the world using stablecoins—cryptocurrencies strategically pegged to the US dollar. They utilize USD Coin (USDC) on the Polygon network, ensuring that users can exchange their stablecoins for local currency at any time.

### Key Features:
1. **Global Instant Transactions**: Whether you're sending money to a friend or family member abroad, Paymobil enables you to do it in seconds without any fees. Just request or send money using an email or phone number.

2. **Stablecoin Transactions**: Paymobil uses USDC, a stablecoin fully backed by US dollars, which is audited monthly by a reputable firm. This means you can trust that your cryptocurrency is pegged to a stable value.

3. **User-Friendly Interface**: Designed with the user experience in mind, Paymobil’s wallet is easier to navigate than traditional peer-to-peer payment apps, making crypto technology accessible to everyone, even those unfamiliar with it.

4. **Security First**: Your private key is created on your device, ensuring only you have access to your funds. Paymobil also encrypts and backs up your key to iCloud or Google Drive, so you're safe even if you lose your phone.

5. **Buy and Save in Dollars**: Users can buy dollars using cards or bank accounts and get paid directly in stablecoins, regardless of their location around the globe.

### Conclusion
In a world where cross-border payments can take days and can be costly, Paymobil is stepping up to offer a fast, secure, and user-friendly solution. With the growing adoption of cryptocurrencies and increasing demand for hassle-free financial services, Paymobil is well-positioned to redefine how we think about money. If you're ready to embrace the future of transactions, visit [Paymobil's website](https://www.paymobil.co) and get started today!
